==Trivia==
* <section begin="CorruptionLeitmotif1" />The following soundtracks share a leitmotif:
** [[Breaking the Miasma]]
** [[Snare Awaiting]] <section end="CorruptionLeitmotif1" />
* The Chinese name of the soundtrack may be a reference to a poem recorded in the ''{{w|Classic of Poetry}}'' {{Lang|zh=诗经|zh_rm=Shījīng}}. The poem reads:
** {{zh|嘒彼小星，三五在东。<br>肃肃宵征，夙夜在公。寔命不同。<br>嘒彼小星，维参与昴。<br>肃肃宵征，抱衾与裯。寔命不犹。}}<br>Little are those stars, three to five of them in the east.<br>Solemn we embark on this twilit expedition, relentless through day and night for our lord. How lamentable, my lot, so unlike any other!<br>Little are those stars, those constellations of ''{{w|Three Stars (Chinese constellation)|Shen}}'' and ''{{w|Hairy Head|Mao}}''.<br>Solemn we embark on this twilit expedition, casting aside our quilt and bedding. How lamentable, my lot!
